text:
:wave: Hello, inside the React code I’m trying to fetch an url

```fetch("<https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1>", requestOptions)
    .then(response => response.text())
    .then(result => console.log(result))
    .catch(error => console.log('error', error));```
But I have an CSP Error
`Refused to connect to '<https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1>' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "connect-src none".`
You have to use serverless functions for all api requests

<@U05S8ER7KH6> we have been working on some things to help this situation, like eslint config, etc. that can help give you better real-time feedback as you're programming on what's allowed vs not. Hopefully we can make this all simpler soon!
Thanks! <@U01NMMDTERZ> and <@U01QVR44MEY> after a few changes and using serverless functions looks like api call is working!
<@U05S8ER7KH6>. Hi. Do you mind to share a couple line of code as I’m struggling with the same? Thx, Thomas.
